events.title: Sprint Planning - Team Phoenix
events.description: Sprint 13 planning: OAuth implementation, database optimization, and CI/CD improvements. Review backlog and commit to sprint goals.

events.title: Architecture Review - Security Enhancements
events.description: Review OAuth 2.0 implementation design (ENG-123). Security team sign-off required before production deployment.

events.title: 1:1 with CTO - Q4 Planning
events.description: Discuss Q4 engineering priorities, budget approval status, and team expansion plans.

events.title: Incident Post-Mortem - INC-001
events.description: Review production outage from Oct 3. Discuss root cause, preventive measures, and action items to improve failover mechanisms.

events.title: Team Lunch - Welcome New Hires
events.description: Welcome lunch for 3 new DevOps engineers joining the team this week.
